testcase.name: User calls web service to get a book by its ISBN

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: 1 expectation failed. JSON path items.volumeInfo.industryIdentifiers.type doesn't match. Expected: iterable over ["ISBN_13,ISBN_10"] in any order Actual: [[ISBN_13, ISBN_10]]

testcase.failure:
Given a book exists with an isbn of 9781451648546...........................passed When a user retrieves the book by isbn......................................passed Then the status code is 200.................................................passed And response includes the following.........................................passed And response includes the following in any order............................failed
